info.summary: Fix the capacity of the opera house (Modpacc Zero)
info.warning: If you have previously built opera houses with Toroca's original opera house fix (toroca:opera-house-fix), you should keep Toroca's fix in your plugins as well (but only then). Otherwise, you can ignore this warning.
info.conflicts: This mod is compatible with both the Maxis opera house and Toroca's opera house fix, regardless of load order.
info.description:
This mod adds a slider to the opera house query to solve a capacity problem that can have a major impact on city growth.
This mod only affects newly built opera houses and leaves pre-existing opera houses untouched.
info.author: CorinaMarie, Cyclone Boom, memo
